sen.j: 橘娘（たちばなのいらつめ、生年不詳 - 天武天皇10年2月29日 (旧暦)（681年））は、阿倍倉梯麻呂の娘。
sen.e: TACHIBANA no Iratsume (year of birth unknown - March 26, 681) was a daughter of ABE no Kurahashimaro.
TACHIBANA no Iratsume (year of birth unknown - March 26, 681) was a daughter of ABE no Kurahashimaro.
TACHIBANA no Iratsume (year of birth unknown - March 26, 681) was a daughter of ABE no Kurahashimaro.

sen.j: 天智天皇の妃となり、明日香皇女と新田部皇女を生む。
sen.e: She married Emperor Tenchi and had Princess Asuka and Princess Nitabe.
She married the Emperor Tenchi and had the Princess Asuka and the Princess Nitabe.
She married the Emperor Tenchi and had the Princess Asuka and the Princess Nitabe.

sen.j: 姉妹には、孝徳天皇の妃となった小足媛がいる。
sen.e: Her sister was Otarashihime who married Emperor Kotoku.
Her sister was Otarashihime who married the Emperor Kotoku.
Her sister was Otarashihime who married the Emperor Kotoku.

sen.j: またの名を阿倍夫人とも伝えられている。
sen.e: He name is also known as Abe no fujin (阿倍夫人).
sen.cmt: 正しい読み方が不明です
sen.e: Her name is also known as Abe no fujin (阿倍夫人).
sen.cmt: He→Her と修正しました。「阿倍夫人」の読みは確認できておりません。
sen.e: Her name is also known as Abe no fujin (阿倍夫人).
